Today, Nokia and Microsoft intend to enter into a strategic alliance,'' Stephen Elop said in the video, a precursor of a turnaround plan he's set to detail later today at an analyst conference in London. Together, we will bring consumers a new mobile experience, with stellar hardware, innovative software, and great services. We will create opportunities beyond anything that currently exists.
